definition: a low or small degree of any quality, for example amount, force, or temperature
details:
noun
- a low or small degree of any quality, for example amount, force, or temperature
= example: a low or small degree of any quality, for example amount, force, or temperature
- the quality of being low
- a feeling of low spirits
= example: a feeling of low spirits
= synonyms: downheartedness, dejectedness, low-spiritedness, dispiritedness
- a position of inferior status
= synonyms: low status, lowliness
